data.definition: Expressing disbelief at the Software Hardware Information and/or Technology Used
data.example: What the SHIT is that? Python? React?

data.definition: A phrase commonly used to depict surprise and bewilderment
data.example: What is this SHIT? I havent seen anything as useless since Internet Explorer!

services.name: How do I use this SHIT?

data.definition: Expressing frustration at a new technology
data.example: Oh My God! How do I use this SHIT!

data.definition: Excitement that your project ACTUALLY works.
data.example: Its working! Can you believe this SHIT!

services.name: How do you test this SHIT?

data.definition: Frustration when you attempt to test your project.
data.example: Hey, how do you test this SHIT? Ive never tested with this tool before.

data.definition: Asserting that you have unfinished work to compelete.
data.example: Sorry I can't come to the moveis, I've got SHIT to do.

data.definition: Dealing with the same technology on a different day.
data.example: Here we go again. Same SHIT, different day

data.definition: Primarily used when your co-worker cannot use SHIT correctly.
data.example: Dude, what is this SHIT. Nothing is done right.

services.name: Damn {}, You have alot of SHIT!

data.definition: Used when someone has alot of technology.
data.example: Servers, Programs, and a Triple Monitor Setup? You have alot of SHIT!
